name: Tyler Perry's The Haves and the Have Nots
original_name: Tyler Perry's The Haves and the Have Nots
overview: Follow the complicated dynamic between the rich and powerful Cryer family and the hired help who work in their opulent Savannah, Georgia, mansion.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Tyler Perry's The Haves and the Have Nots continues to heat up as Hanna, the moral conscience of Perry's drama, is tested like never before. Hanna and Benny are almost stripped of everything once Candace finds herself in a world of trouble…again. Jim and Katheryn Cryer are at war with almost everyone who has crossed their path. Their enemies will learn, however, that the Cryers are formidable foes who will stop at nothing to win every battle. The wealthy and powerful seem intent on avoiding the old adage that "what goes around will come back around." Thus, Savannah will never be the same as "the haves" continue to use money to rule the world, while "the have-nots" are forced to look to a higher power.

episodes.name: The Big Surprise
episodes.overview: Jim Cryer learns that his mistress has befriended his daughter; Candace blackmails Jim.

episodes.name: A True Friend
episodes.overview: Amanda has Wyatt and Jeffery assist her with the move into her new apartment while Hanna is set-up on a blind date by Benny.

episodes.name: The Criminal
episodes.overview: Benny prepares for his date by asking to borrow a car but is arrested and charged with drug possession after falling trap to someone's malicious intent. Amanda seduces her professor to raise her grade.

episodes.name: The Set Up
episodes.overview: It is revealed to Hanna that Benny happened to be behind the wheel of Candace's car. David reveals how he participated in the set-up. Katheryn ends up having a bond with Hanna regarding their issues.

episodes.name: Number Nine
episodes.overview: After all the issues going on around her, Amanda tries to commit suicide after an altercation with Candace sets her over the edge. Katheryn shames Candace directly after Jim reveals the affair.

episodes.name: Not My Daughter
episodes.overview: Katheryn tells everyone that she is leaving for vacation but that information turns out to be false. Veronica agrees to work on Benny's case. Wyatt is shocked when a previous girlfriend shows up. Jim receives the news that Amanda and Candace have moved into an apartment together.

episodes.name: In Recovery
episodes.overview: Jim and Candace end up in a verbal altercation. Amanda is in recovery while Katheryn might have to prepare for surgery. Wyatt receives another visitor from his past. After reviewing the case, Veronica questions Jim about some of the details. Amanda reveals a shocker to Candace, that she was raped.

episodes.name: What Are You Doing Here?
episodes.overview: Information is discovered by a detective that links Benny and Tony. Veronica continues to work toward answers for Benny's case. Laura is kept away from Wyatt by Jeffery.

episodes.name: My Name Is Veronica
episodes.overview: Veronica collects enough evidence to send it off to David, which in turn exposes the conspiracy. Katheryn gets nervous when her secret almost goes public.

episodes.name: The Truth Will Set You Free
episodes.overview: After her secret is reveled, Katheryn tells everyone what she really knows about Jim's secret activities. Jeffery finally discloses his love for Wyatt.

episodes.name: No More Hiding
episodes.overview: Jeffery tells his parents that he's gay. Hanna discloses that Tony is actually Benny's father. Candace informs Amanda that her parents are keeping her inheritance.

episodes.name: The Black Sedan
episodes.overview: Hanna waits at the hospital for news on Benny's condition; Candace tries to convince Amanda to stand up for herself.

episodes.name: Wyatt's Nightmare
episodes.overview: After a hit-and-run accident, Wyatt kills a little girl and Benny is on life support; Jim's campaign is in trouble; Amanda's on the verge of a breakdown; Hanna hears bad news about Benny.

episodes.name: Family Issues
episodes.overview: When Celine tries to destroy her accountability, Hanna clashes with Tony about keeping Benny on life support.

episodes.name: Unanswered Calls
episodes.overview: Jeffrey realizes that Wyatt is responsible for Lizzie's death and Benny's condition.

episodes.name: Why Didn't You Tell Me?
episodes.overview: Candace asks Jim to move Benny to a private hospital.

episodes.name: Protecting Wyatt
episodes.overview: Jim tries to keep Wyatt out of jail; Tony serves Hanna with court papers.

episodes.name: Amanda's Revenge
episodes.overview: Candace represents Hanna in court; Amanda slips into the professors room while his family sleeps.

episodes.name: Maggie's Plan
episodes.overview: Despite Wyatt's actions and Candace's threats, Jim readies his campaign announcement.

episodes.name: March for Justice
episodes.overview: The judge rules in Tony's favor; Hanna begs Tony to keep Benny on life support.

episodes.name: Starting the Race
episodes.overview: Candace tries to blackmail Jim and David during their campaign event; Wyatt is arrested.

episodes.name: You'll Be Sorry
episodes.overview:
As Katheryn is helping Hanna get out of jail, Wyatt is arrested for the hit-and-run of a little girl and Benny. Katheryn is devastated to learn that Hanna turned Wyatt in, but Hanna tells her that she will not sacrifice Benny for Wyatt, no matter how much Katheryn's helped him. Furious, Jim tells Hanna that he will not be accepting her apology when she discovers she's wrong about Wyatt being the hit-and-run driver. After some thought, though, Katheryn tells Jim that they should just let Wyatt pay for what he's done instead of protecting him.

Then, after a dramatic day at the campaign office, David and Veronica continue to disagree about Jeffery's sexual orientation, and Jeffery still struggles with his own identity.

Elsewhere, Candace realizes that she is in a fight for her life when she is given an ultimatum by her captors.

Meanwhile, Hanna is given hope at Mercy Hospital when Benny's new doctor tells her that her son is demonstrating slight brain activity.

episodes.name: The Confession
episodes.overview:
In the wake of Wyatt's arrest, Jim is confronted by the district attorney, Jennifer Sallison, and learns that Wyatt has confessed to the hit-and-run. To make matters worse for the Cryers, the DA vows to come after Jim next.

At Mercy Hospital, Hanna meets Darlene, a concerned nurse and former classmate of Benny's. Dr. Bailor also gives Hanna some hopeful news: He thinks Benny may not need the ventilator anymore.

Elsewhere, Jeffery confronts Veronica about Wyatt's arrest, but Veronica only continues to push her agenda by forcing Jeffery to go on a date with a young woman.

Meanwhile, Candace is at the mercy of the Malones and is forced to come clean about not being pregnant to save herself from a forced abortion.

Later, Amanda buys a gun from a pawnshop and asks the clerk some loaded questions about shooting professors.

Finally, much to Maggie's surprise and chagrin, Jim holds a press conference and announces that he has been part of a cover-up.

episodes.name: Donald
episodes.overview:
During a citywide press conference, Jim proclaims his son's innocence of the heinous double hit-and-run that killed a little girl and left Benny in critical condition. He declares that on the night in question, Wyatt did hit someone, a man named Donald (a paid prop), whom Jim introduces to the public. The gubernatorial candidate professes to have settled with Donald out of court, the actions of a loving, if misguided, father.

Meanwhile, Hanna gets a frightful visit from Quincy as he searches for Candace. Later, at the hospital, she gets another unwelcome guest—Tony has finally found where Benny is being treated and demands that he be taken off life support.

Elsewhere, Amanda continues to hint at murdering her parents, causing a worried Jeffery to reiterate his concerns to Katheryn. Across town, Jim gets Wyatt out of jail and brings him home.

And, Candace is still tied up in the Malones' basement and must endure Rose's threats of a terrible fate.

episodes.name: The Awakening
episodes.overview:
Hanna is overjoyed as Benny finally wakes up from his coma and makes astounding progress in recovery. He also reconnects with an old classmate who has been caring for him in the hospital.

After Wyatt is released from jail, he contemplates his mistakes and goes to visit the grave of Lizzie, the little girl he killed, where he is recognized by the girl's mother as the hit-and-run driver.

David continues to be supportive of Jeffery and attempts to understand his life by talking with Landon. However, David encounters another personal problem when Maggie oversteps her professional boundaries.

Meanwhile, Quincy, the father of Candace's child, shows up at Candace and Amanda's apartment, and Amanda discovers that Candace's past is more of an enigma than she thought.

Elsewhere, Jim pays the still-captive Candace a visit and gives her a final chance to save her life.

episodes.name: The Vulnerable
episodes.overview: Benny prepares for his release from the hospital; Hanna plans to testify against Wyatt; Jim finds his fall guy; Quincy tries to get information about Candace from Amanda.

episodes.name: The Sarandon Hotel
episodes.overview: After escaping her kidnappers, Candace asks Warlock for help; Jeffrey is seduced by Melissa.

episodes.name: Again and Again
episodes.overview: David's caught in a compromising position; Jim's plans to clear Wyatt's name causes tension; Candace panics.

episodes.name: Something's Wrong With Amanda
episodes.overview: Amanda leaves the estate with Quincy and sends Katheryn into a panic; Candace hides out at Jeffery's place; Sallison pursues Wyatt and Jim.

episodes.name: Norman Hewens
episodes.overview: A news report claiming that another person is responsible for the hit-and-run saves Wyatt from jail. Katheryn berates Jim about his evil deeds. Hanna attempts to apologize to Jim for her hand in the tragedy, but he won't have it and orders her off his property; however, Katheryn has a tearful and beautiful reunion with her best friend, and offers Hanna her job back and to begin after Benny is settled in. Katheryn then tells Jim off about his attitude towards Hanna and orders him to keep Celine under control or else.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: Jim is confronted by Carlos, his illegitimate son with Celine. Katheryn's celebratory dinner party goes awry when Quincy, Candace's ex, shows up as Amanda's date. David and Veronica continue to battle over the fact that Jeffrey is gay. Candace seeks her revenge on Jim. Maggie makes another attempt to sleep with David.

episodes.name: The Power Dance
episodes.overview: Hanna hosts a party for Benny; Jim is being held hostage; David resists the temptation to be intimate with Maggie.

episodes.name: The War Room
episodes.overview: Hanna seeks information about Quincy's mother so she can get one step closer to finding her grandson's room.

episodes.name: A Southern Brawl
episodes.overview: Wyatt gives Celine a taste of reality and he finds out a about his brother Carlos.

episodes.name: Amanda's Room
episodes.overview: Jim gives up and finally gives in to Candace's demands.

episodes.name: The Press Conference
episodes.overview: Katheryn gets some devastating news.

episodes.name: A Tragic Day
episodes.overview: Everyone else is assembled at the Cryer mansion.

episodes.name: April 7, 1979
episodes.overview: Katheryn tells the story of how she first met Jim.

episodes.name: In Crisis
episodes.overview: Katheryn and David try to tell Veronica how wrong she is about Jeffery.

episodes.name: A Talk with Jim
episodes.overview: Benny is convinced that Candace has changed her ways.

episodes.name: Oscar
episodes.overview: Hanna comforts Jim after Amanda's death.

episodes.name: Unglued
episodes.overview: David is angry at Veronica for telling Quincy to beat up Jeffrey.

episodes.name: Enough is Enough
episodes.overview: Benny searches for Quincy after he shows up at Hanna's home.

episodes.name: Two Funerals
episodes.overview: Veronica starts a fire that destroys her mansion and almost claims David's life.

episodes.name: In Memoriam
episodes.overview: Wyatt's confession to D.A. Sallison sparks controversy.

episodes.name: Nine Lives
episodes.overview: Hanna finds out that Jim and Katheryn were holding Candace hostage.

episodes.name: The Cougar
episodes.overview: Hanna finds Benny in bed with Veronica; Melissa demands that Jeffrey's parents take care of her own.

episodes.name: Candace Young, Esq.
episodes.overview: Candace shows Benny where she works.

episodes.name: Benny Does Battle
episodes.overview: Quincy is hurt from the accident.

episodes.name: Quincy Jr.
episodes.overview: Hanna is reunited with Q.

episodes.name: A Home For Q
episodes.overview: Candace learns that Hanna is seeking custody of Q; and the Cryers and Harringtons try to convince the D.A. that Wyatt's taped confession is a misunderstanding.

episodes.name: Candace's Closing
episodes.overview: Candace buys property with the money she extorted from Jim; and Jim is interviewed on TV.

episodes.name: Dianna Whinchil
episodes.overview: While Jim is being interviewed by Dianna Winchill, a surprise guest arrives. Veronica tells Jim that she had planned Wyatt's attack in prison, leading Jim to attack her and later put a hit on her, Professor Cannon, and Prison Guard Terrell by calling three hitmen and ordering a "bloodbath."

episodes.name: Vetted
episodes.overview: Hanna grows suspicious of Benny's involvement with Veronica and how he acquired his new house; Quincy drives a car through Hanna's home in spite of revenge; Candace decides to let her guard down with Oscar.

episodes.name: Sheep's Clothing
episodes.overview: Hanna becomes devastated when she learns that Quincy set her house on fire; Maggie tries to talk David into running for Governor; Jeffrey gives Wyatt the necessary ammunition to take his parents down.

episodes.name: When The Chicken's Come Home
episodes.overview: Hanna and Benny force Candace to tell the truth about everything.

episodes.name: The Waters Run Deep
episodes.overview: Katheryn and Veronica are taken to the police station Candace and Jeffrey disagree on what to do with Quincy's body when interrupted by a knock on the door.

episodes.name: To Hell And BackTo Hell And Back
episodes.overview: Katheryn has had a lot of time for reflection while cooling her heels behind bars with Veronica. Candace and Jeffery get a visit from police because of a nosy neighbor.

episodes.name: The Payback
episodes.overview: Katheryn is taken aback by the photo of Veronica in the arms of another man. Quincy wakes up and begs for Candace's help.

episodes.name: Blood Is Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Katheryn is unshaken by the DA's attempt to push. Candace's lies catch up with her.

episodes.name: Your Time Is Up
episodes.overview: Benny agrees to help Candace hide evidence in Quincy's murder.

episodes.name: Making Millions
episodes.overview: Quincy Jr. passes out on Hanna after getting really sick and is taken to the hospital and placed in ICU.

episodes.name: A Front Row Seat
episodes.overview: Maggie's lie to David could cause her to lose him forever; Katheryn gets out of jail but she can't find anyone to help Jim or Veronica.

episodes.name: Unexpected Visitors
episodes.overview: Candace interrogates the social worker; Hanna is steaking out at Cryer's mansion waiting for their return; Katheryn goes to visit David but little does she know that Wyatt is one step closer to getting his inheritance.

episodes.name: I Choose My Son
episodes.overview: Quita and Daylon break into Candace's house but are caught by Pearl, who calls her son Justin and his police squad to arrest them; Justin continues to harass Jeffery.

episodes.name: Beg for What You Need
episodes.overview: Candace puts a plan into action to save herself and Benny from War's rage. Katheryn pleads with Hanna to not end their friendship. Veronica handles the hired assassin hiding in her house in an unexpected manner.

episodes.name: 48 Hours
episodes.overview: Warlock has pushed up Candace's due date, so she goes to the bank to mortgage the houses and Benny's tow yard.

episodes.name: My Friend Maggie
episodes.overview: Maggie visit's Veronica's home and gets the surprise of her life

episodes.name: Criminology 101
episodes.overview: Veronica treats David with much malice.

episodes.name: Giving Candy to a Baby
episodes.overview: After talking with Pearl, Hanna hopes to gain custody of Quincy Jr.

episodes.name: The Apple Tree
episodes.overview: Katheryn Cryer tries to process difficult news about one of her closest family members.

episodes.name: The Heart of a Man
episodes.overview: Veronica and Jeffery go to visit Katheryn but Veronica pushes Jeffery to his limit.

episodes.name: An Accident
episodes.overview: Jeffrey begins to implode so he calls Candace and Justin for help.

episodes.name: A Tragic Assumption
episodes.overview: Jennifer arrives at Katheryn's house to tell her that Wyatt is alive.

episodes.name: I Am Wolf
episodes.overview: Jim teams up with a former enemy in his scheme against Candace.

episodes.name: Back in Business
episodes.overview: Mitch breaks up the fight between David and Benny; David gets some shocking information about Mitch.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: The police are on the look out for Hanna so they question Candace and Benny.

episodes.name: The Silk Handkerchief
episodes.overview: Benny learns the truth of how Candace financed his property. Candace finally tells him the truth about War and how she got the money, and what Mitch did but he doesn't believe her.

episodes.name: Promises Kept
episodes.overview: Katheryn explodes when she is pushed to the limit. Benny finds out the truth about War by Mitch, who also reveals to Benny who he really is.

episodes.name: A Cup of Tea
episodes.overview: Veronica tries to escape the Cryer Mansion. Jeffery is still trying to get a hold of Candace. Benny is still upset because of how Candace Mortgaged his house and the tow yard.

episodes.name: Waiting for Candace
episodes.overview: Benny holds out hope that Candace will come through for the family.

episodes.name: It's OK to Love
episodes.overview: Veronica is still trying to escape Katheryn's mansion. Erica called Candace to give her an update on things with David.

episodes.name: A Mother's Wisdom
episodes.overview: Veronica wants to meet with Candace and Jeffery. Jim helps Katheryn clean up a mess she has created.

episodes.name: Brilliant Lawyers Lurking
episodes.overview: Veronica helps Candace and Jeffery out of a precarious predicament.

episodes.name: A Hurricane Offshore
episodes.overview: Veronica pays Erica a visit Candace encounters Oscar again. Quit'a finds Wyatt's place and tells him that she's going to take his money.

episodes.name: The Pieces of the Puzzle
episodes.overview: Veronica lets Jim know that if anything happens to her she has dirt on him. Hanna questions Benny and Candace about what they did to Quincy.

episodes.name: Praying for Light
episodes.overview: Veronica planted a camera in those flowers she delivered to Erica. Hanna does all she can to keep the peace in her family.

episodes.name: We All Need Forgiveness
episodes.overview: Veronica tells Justin to stay away from Jeffery. Candace makes Charles her latest Mark.

episodes.name: Forget the Bubble
episodes.overview: Veronica is pushing Jeffery's buttons. Erica is caught sleeping with David by War.

episodes.name: In Pursuit of Prey
episodes.overview: Veronica tries to seduce Benny. Warlock looks for Candace, Mitch returns from jail. Katheryn leaves Jim, Wyatt checks himself into rehab of his own volition.

episodes.name: The Fallout From War
episodes.overview: Veronica goes in a rage after Melissa attempts suicide in her bed. In the aftermath of the shootout it is revealed that Quincy Jr is dead.

episodes.name: My Grandson's War
episodes.overview: Veronica and Katheryn came face-to-face. Katheryn was able to be the friend that Hanna needed in comfort; Mama Rose inflict a bit of fear into Jim Cryer.

episodes.name: Mad Day
episodes.overview: Veronica intervened and proved her skills by representing Benny, Jim taunted Veronica, Hanna found herself at Katheryn's new rental home.

episodes.name: A Woman Under the Stairs
episodes.overview: Veronica threatens to reveal Officer Justin's secret and accuses him of sexually harassing Jeffrey. David and Jim find their sons. Charles reveals to Candace who he really is.

episodes.name: Railroaded
episodes.overview: Veronica visits Melissa at the hospital. Katheryn helps Hanna deal with Benny's situation. Wyatt gets released from the hospital. Charles beats Candace at her own game.

episodes.name: Elevator Seven
episodes.overview: Veronica tried to confront Erica and David on the elevator about their relationship. Landon tries to warn Charles about Candace. Jeffrey meets up with Landon.

episodes.name: A Broken Mirror
episodes.overview: Veronica catches Officer Justin in Jeffrey's hotel room, and records Officer Justin. Jim is trying to find Warlock before Mamma Rose does.

episodes.name: Haunted by the Surname
episodes.overview: Veronica is confronted by Officer Justin. Candace starts to see Erica for who she truly is. Candace gets some devastating news.

episodes.name: The Enemy Called Trust
episodes.overview: Veronica tells Landon to stay away her son. Jim is shocked to see that his house is on fire. Candace ask Mitch for a favor. Warlock gets caught in a deadly trap.

episodes.name: Kate
episodes.overview: Veronica makes Melissa clean her blood out of her bed. Jim and Katheryn implode with emotion. Jim confronts Katheryn, and begs her for retribution.

episodes.name: For the Team
episodes.overview: Veronica gives Jeffrey and Officer Justin an ultimatum. Candace and Benny are at odds with each other. David tells Jeffrey to stay away from Veronica.

episodes.name: The Veronica Show
episodes.overview: Veronica does something that puts Officer Justin at rage. Candace struggles with sorrow and the death of Quincy Jr. Jim confronts Candace at The Artesian Hotel.

episodes.name: Afraid of Flames
episodes.overview: Hanna is in mourning after a deadly shooting. Candace rejects Benny's pleas to help her. Veronica and Melissa find themselves in danger.

episodes.name: Searching For A Mother's Love
episodes.overview: Benny and Mitch risk their lives to save victims of a horrific auto accident. Justin professes his love and lust for Jeffery.

episodes.name: Undercover Vice
episodes.overview: David discovers Jeffrey's whereabouts. Hanna and Benny confront Candace.

episodes.name: The Lion
episodes.overview: Hanna reveals a deep, dark secret; David calls Katheryn for help with Jeffrey.

episodes.name: Errand Boy
episodes.overview: Justin tries to convince Jeffrey of his love; Candace and Benny fight to keep their relationship.

episodes.name: Hanna's Tea
episodes.overview: Veronica returns home after a stay in the hospital; Candace and Jeffrey 's secret crime begins to catch up with them; Hanna meets a new man.

episodes.name: Every Six Months
episodes.overview: Candace gets released from jail while David fights to get Jeffrey out of jail.

episodes.name: Wicked
episodes.overview: Sarah and George make progress in prosecuting the Cryers; Veronica concocts a scheme against David.

episodes.name: An Eye for an Eye
episodes.overview: David fights to save his son Jeffery; Charles yearns to see Candace.

episodes.name: A Lover's Passion
episodes.overview: Candace works on a new plan to recoup her money from the Cryers; Veronica is preoccupied by an all-consuming desire for revenge

episodes.name: Veronica's House
episodes.overview: Veronica lets it be known that she is the only queen in the kingdom; Candace reverts to old ways.

episodes.name: In His Eyes
episodes.overview: Candace enacts her new money scheme like a boss.

episodes.name: The Right Cocktail
episodes.overview: Wyatt once again finds himself in a life-threatening situation.

episodes.name: The Rabbit and the Water Moccasin
episodes.overview: Wyatt learns just how much trouble drugs can get one into.

episodes.name: The Third Quarter
episodes.overview: Benny wants to return the money to the Malone's but discovers it's not that simple.

episodes.name: No Honor in This Game
episodes.overview: Katheryn learns that Wyatt's anger for her comes from childhood scars that are deep.

episodes.name: The Broken Washer
episodes.overview: Veronica and Candace scheme up a plan to hurt David.

episodes.name: Sugar Mamma
episodes.overview: Officer Justin shows Jeffery just how serious he is about being with him.

episodes.name: Team of Rivals
episodes.overview: David is pushed by Veronica to a point that he didn't know he had.

episodes.name: Smitten
episodes.overview: Charles learns that Landon may have ulterior motives.

episodes.name: Moles
episodes.overview: Benny's arrest forces Candace back to her old tricks to make some quick cash to leave town.

episodes.name: Til Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: Candace and Jim are up to their old tricks while people are caught in the crossfire of Veronica's wicked plots and intimidations.

episodes.name: The Road to Hell
episodes.overview: After being pushed to the limit, Veronica finally gets her revenge.

episodes.name: The Black Dress
episodes.overview: David learns Erica's fate while being rushed to the hospital; the truth about Uncle Vinny's accident comes out, and the Malones now have a new target.

episodes.name: A Father's Regret
episodes.overview: An explosion in this small town sets more on fire than just a car. Who will survive?

episodes.name: The Damned Defibrillator
episodes.overview: While David is the hospital, Veronica gets a shock of her own.

episodes.name: Laugh Not to Cry
episodes.overview: Veronica tries to convince RK to do some of her dirty work.

episodes.name: Stronger Together
episodes.overview: Candace's plan begins to unravel as Benny discovers what she did to Hanna.

episodes.name: The Black Man ...
episodes.overview: Jim tries to save Wyatt from himself; Jeffrey deals with an uninvited guest.

episodes.name: Three's A Crowd
episodes.overview: Candace comes face to face with Katheryn Cryer.

episodes.name: The Chosen
episodes.overview: The future president of the United States is back and chooses Candace.

episodes.name: The Committee
episodes.overview: Jeffrey's scare with David brings him closer to Nurse Madison as the FBI gets one step closer to Veronica's wicked trail.

episodes.name: Exhausted
episodes.overview: Jim thinks he holds all the cards, but there's a ticking time bomb coming his way.

episodes.name: Speak Through It
episodes.overview: Benny is severely rushed to the hospital following a shooting incident and Mitch reveals to Hanna about what happened with him. Katheryn attempts to mix business with pleasure. Veronica is taken to the hospital after falling off a stairwell railing and the FBI pays her a little visit.

episodes.name: Battle For The Past
episodes.overview: Secrets are revealed when everyone comes together at the hospital.

episodes.name: A Good Man
episodes.overview: Justin will stop at nothing to make sure Jeffrey is his.

episodes.name: The Surgeon
episodes.overview: Veronica is simmering, and someone is going to get burned.

episodes.name: Power Struggle
episodes.overview: Justin focuses on Jeffrey with laser-like intensity; Katheryn gets a taste of what it's like on the other side of the tracks.

episodes.name: From the Seventies
episodes.overview: Wyatt is in jail; the Cryers secrets may make it out before he does.

episodes.name: Room Three
episodes.overview: Jeffery comes to Justin's aid.

episodes.name: Enough
episodes.overview: Jeffery tries to handle the Justin situation amicably.

episodes.name: Morning
episodes.overview: Wyatt takes the witness stand intent on revenge.

episodes.name: Fifteen Minutes
episodes.overview: The Harringtons and the Cryers must join forces in order to save them all.

episodes.name: Out of Time
episodes.overview: A tattoo is worth a thousand words.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Tyler Perry's The Haves and the Have Nots continues to heat up as Hanna, the moral conscience of Perry's drama, is tested like never before. Hanna and Benny are almost stripped of everything once Candace finds herself in a world of trouble…again. Jim and Katheryn Cryer are at war with almost everyone who has crossed their path. Their enemies will learn, however, that the Cryers are formidable foes who will stop at nothing to win every battle. The wealthy and powerful seem intent on avoiding the old adage that "what goes around will come back around." Thus, Savannah will never be the same as "the haves" continue to use money to rule the world, while "the have-nots" are forced to look to a higher power.

episodes.name: A Wicked Web
episodes.overview: Details about Hanna's past are unraveled; Justin finally gets Jeffery to himself; Candace and Charles have a very special dinner.

episodes.name: Dessert
episodes.overview: Some dinners end with dessert, but not at Justin's house.

episodes.name: Spanish Moss Trail
episodes.overview: Madison intercepts an ominous call at the hospital.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: Veronica faces off with Officer Justin while Scott builds his case against Candace.

episodes.name: On the Edge
episodes.overview: No one is safe from the danger looming in the city of Savannah, Ga.

episodes.name: A New Leaf
episodes.overview: Candace plans to turn over a new leaf.

episodes.name: She's Gonna Be Real Mad
episodes.overview: David's blunder has deadly consequences; Candace loses something precious to her.

episodes.overview: Veronica and Wyatt retaliate against their enemies.

episodes.name: The Executor
episodes.overview: Tyler Perry's The Haves and the Have Nots is a television drama from the prolific writer, director and producer Tyler Perry. The show follows the complicated dynamic between the rich and powerful Cryer family and the hired help who work in their opulent Savannah, Georgia, mansion.
